code: import typeCart from"./cart.type";var toggleCartHiden=function toggleCartHiden(){return{type:typeCart.TOGGLE_CART_HIDEN};};export default toggleCartHiden;export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:typeCart.ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var clearItemFromCart=function clearItemFromCart(item){return{type:typeCart.CLEAR_ITEM_FROM_CART,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:typeCart.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};
